Comment.Text: Open the wallpanel door if it's not already open
Check to see if any t_usechannelextra tags were passed into the UseUseChannel task when calling this use channel. If not, select a random inspect action.
Play an inspect animation using whatever type of inspection was decided in the previous step.
Check for the "Visual" use channel tag in t_usechannelextra
Set the "examineFragTags" string variable to the visual inspect fragment tag
Check for the "Datapad" use channel tag in t_usechannelextra
Check to make sure the character has a Datapad item equipped/available
Check for the "Flashlight" use channel tag in t_usechannelextra
Check to make sure the character has a Flashlight item equipped/available
Set t_usechannelextra to use the datapad inspect fragment tags
Set t_usechannelextra to use the flashlight inspect fragment tags
Cast the InitialRoutingUsable (the fuse the NPC has found) to an object.
Check to make sure the fuse is also a carryable item
Take the fuse out of the wallpanel
Perform an inspect action on the fuse, while holding it
Perform another visual inspect on the wallpanel without taking the fuse out
If no tags have been found in t_usechannelextra then randomly select the type of inspect to perform
These three selectors attempt each possible type of inspection in a different order. If an option fails then it will attempt the next one.
Set the tags for a visual inspection
Check to make sure the NPC has a Datapad equipped/available
Check to make sure the NPC has a Flashlight equipped/available
Set the tags for a datapad inspection
Set the tags for a flashlight inspection
Am I holding anything?

Task.Name: Task_020
Task.DebugStart: Performing an Inspect on the held Sub Component

Task.DebugFailure: Failed to Inspect the held Sub Component

Task.DebugFailure: The Sub Component was not also a Carryable
